titles.title: Early Intervention for Toddlers and Infants with Disabilities Act
To reauthorize part C of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 12/30/2012--Introduced. Early Intervention for Toddlers and Infants with Disabilities Act - Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to reauthorize appropriations, for FY2014-FY2019, for the program providing early intervention services for disabled infants and toddlers.
